interactables.name: Jewel 1
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel a sudden surge of light enter your body.

interactables.name: Jewel 2
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel a sudden surge of darkness build up within you.

interactables.name: Jewel 3
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel the might of earth tremble within you.

interactables.name: Jewel 4
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel the rush of water torrent within you.

interactables.name: Jewel 5
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel an inferno build up within you.

interactables.name: Jewel 6
dialogue: By interacting with the jewel on this pedestal, you feel a strong breeze well up inside you.
